q1: The best Brazilian player is Mourinho
a1: No the best Brazilian player is Neymar. His skills make everyone else on the team better. The proof is in his salary.
q2: I guess he plays well whenever he's not rolling on the floor.
a2: What percent of Brazil budget is his salary?
q3: Well, Neymar was transferred to PSG last year for a record $263 million.
q4: I can argue that Ronaldhino changed the way soccer was played during his time.
a4: How did Ronaldhino change the game?
q5: He changed the way he played completely because the ball always went through his feet
